title: Princess Road: Bara to Dokuro no Monshou

alternative_titles.ja: プリンセス・ロード 薔薇と髑髏の紋章

synopsis: Yurie, princess of Asronia is kidnapped on her way to a celebration in the kingdom of Gostaria by the dragon forces of the Demon Dragon King. Yurie's bodyguard, Maya, survives the attack, and has vowed to rescue Yurie no matter the cost. Untill then, however, Yurie must endure the Demon Dragon King's sexual depravations.
